On 2010-04-07 16:12, Ron Johnson wrote: 
[snip] 
> 
> Mart's method is the shell way. The 3GL Way is: 
> 
> grep -w "$NAME" "$FILE" 
> TMP=$? 
> if [ "$TMP" = "1" ]; 
 
That should be: 
 
if [ "$TMP" = "0" ]; 
 
> then 
> echo -e "$NAME\n" >> "$FILE" 
> fi 
> 
>
